tweet: Tomorrow, is a big day, when we'll kick off the first of our Haskell Shelley Testnet programs. In this first phase, a small team of selected stake pool 'pioneers' will help us set things up. Here's technical lead, Kevin Hammond on what to expect @Cardano  https://t.co/pwkTScztX7  https://t.co/NRcRlzYJIl

ADA is #crypto that ensures security and #decentralization of #Cardano #blockchain. Imagine bank contracts, millions of transactions a day, tokenized bonds, stocks, commodities, stable coins. You can own the global network of the future via $ADA.   https://t.co/X1VOxPqNbz

Fiat money is backed by a strong social contract and banks that keep the status quo.  #Crypto is backed by innovative #blockchain technology and freedom. Adoption of #Cardano is about changing people's mindsets. We generally want freedom, fairness, and privacy. Bullish for $ADA.  https://t.co/3hevqG7Jdb

WORK at @CardanoStiftung (Remote): We continue expanding, attracting top talent and adding new competencies to strengthen our collective skillset. Check our current vacancies, join our growing team and become a part of the Cardano’s growth. Click here:  https://t.co/trKyxCxj4z

F&F will start test #Cardano Haskell node tomorrow. Symbolically on the same day as #Bitcoin halving. Cardano is the third generation of #blockchain and a natural continuation of the #crypto revolution.  BTW we are not far from hard-fork and launching of the main-net.  https://t.co/duRhd4yPRb

In today's complex world we cannot return to gold. We are used to digital transactions, invoices, lending, insurance, contracts, etc. #Cardano is designed to work well in the 21st century. We need to build a new financial system more than to reinvent the store of value.  https://t.co/HRDGsh91Ft
